name: Henry® 925 BES Sealant
description: Henry® 925 BES Sealant is a premium, moisture cure sealant for construction joints subject to dynamic joint movement. This one-part, low odor, moisture cure product provides excellent weathering resistance, flexibility, very low VOC, through use of a silyl-terminated polyether (STPE) polymer. Upon curing, it is paintable with latex based paints. This product is fully compatible with Henry air barrier, flashing, roofing and waterproofing systems.
